mailto:leo.liu@originplus.com https://www.linkedin.com/in/liu-fang-%E5%88%98%E6%96%B9-4556406? jobid=1234&lipi=urn%3Ali%3Apage%3Ad_jobs_easyapply_pdfgenresume%3Ben3GGYUQRjiybvlHX3niPA%3D%3D&licu=urn%3Ali%3A control%3Ad_jobs_easyapply_pdfgenresume-v02_profile https://www.linkedin.com/in/liu-fang-%E5%88%98%E6%96%B9-4556406? jobid=1234&lipi=urn%3Ali%3Apage%3Ad_jobs_easyapply_pdfgenresume%3Ben3GGYUQRjiybvlHX3niPA%3D%3D&licu=urn%3Ali%3A control%3Ad_jobs_easyapply_pdfgenresume-v02_profile https://www.linkedin.com/in/liu-fang-%E5%88%98%E6%96%B9-4556406? jobid=1234&lipi=urn%3Ali%3Apage%3Ad_jobs_easyapply_pdfgenresume%3Ben3GGYUQRjiybvlHX3niPA%3D%3D&licu=urn%3Ali%3A control%3Ad_jobs_easyapply_pdfgenresume-v02_profile http://www.originplus.com ÂÂ head of new product development, to develop a biomass energy solution to help consumer in rural area in emerging country have a cleaner, safer and more affordable living in kitchen.

GE Healthcare 6 years Design Director May 2006Â -ÂJune 2008Â (2 years 2 months) Shanghai, China Establishing China studio of global design from scratch, covering the region of greater China, Indian, East Europe and Latin American, serving all modalities in a full spectrum : product definition, product design, UX/UI design and service design. Paying great efforts to place design in a more strategic role in the "ICFC( in China for China) strategy for GE Healthcare, making design the partner of product strategy and planning in the very early stage of NPD process. Introducing User-centric approach and design thinking to whole R&D and product organization. Design Manager July 2004Â -Â May 2006Â (1 year 11 months) Leading the design team for global marketing,GE Plastics, reporting to GM of global design. Using design as a tool to explore the future opportunity of the innovative application of plastic resin, which gave critical possibilities for marketing strategy and material R&D as well. Closely collaborating with industry leaders on the most forward looking areas such as renewable energy house, high-speed train, electric vehicle, mobile computing etc. Senior Design Consultant July 2002Â -ÂJuly 2004Â (2 years 1 month) Working as a senior design consultant for GE/FITCH, which was a joint venture of GE Plastic and Fitch worldwide at the time. Providing pretty hard-core design services such as DFMA to GE Plastics, and strategic design services such as PI ( product identity) to other clients in Greater China and SEA . Midea lead designer / design manager August 1997Â -Â March 2002Â (4 years 8 months)
ÂPage2of3

ÂÂ As the pioneer of in-house industrial designer in China, providing product design service to Midea and other benefit-conflict free external clients. Beside using the very old school design techniques of hand sketching, hand rendering and hand made prototypes, we were the pioneers of adopting contemporary design techniques, such 2D rendering, 3D modeling and 3D printing back then. As the major driver, to help import user-centric approach into design process, including adoption of user research and UX/UI design .

Education Jiangnan University master of engineering of design,Â Industrial and Product DesignÂ ·Â (2004Â -Â 2007) Jiangnan University Bachelor of Arts - BA,Â Industrial and Product DesignÂ ·Â (1993Â -Â 1993)
ÂPage3of3

workExperience.jobDescription: Establishing China studio of global design from scratch, covering the region of greater China, Indian, East Europe and Latin American, serving all modalities in a full spectrum : product definition, product design, UX/UI design and service design. Paying great efforts to place design in a more strategic role in the "ICFC( in China for China) strategy for GE Healthcare, making design the partner of product strategy and planning in the very early stage of NPD process. Introducing User-centric approach and design thinking to whole R&D and product organization.

workExperience.jobDescription: Leading the design team for global marketing,GE Plastics, reporting to GM of global design. Using design as a tool to explore the future opportunity of the innovative application of plastic resin, which gave critical possibilities for marketing strategy and material R&D as well. Closely collaborating with industry leaders on the most forward looking areas such as renewable energy house, high-speed train, electric vehicle, mobile computing etc.

Working as a senior design consultant for GE/FITCH, which was a joint venture of GE Plastic and Fitch worldwide at the time. Providing pretty hard-core design services such as DFMA to GE Plastics, and strategic design services such as PI ( product identity) to other clients in Greater China and SEA .

location.rawInput: 湖北省武汉市 湖北省武汉市

sections.text: 个人简历
一、 基本信息 姓名: 蒙颖 联系方式: 18788635108 性别: 女 邮箱: 1350437009@qq.com 籍贯: 贵州省都匀市 微信: MY1350437009 户籍所在地: 湖北省武汉市 目前所在地: 湖北省武汉市 期望地点: 湖北省武汉市 婚姻状况: 未婚

二、 自我评价 1、 本人有招聘相关经验, 熟练使用各大招聘软件, 熟知各类招聘电话术语, 以及熟知面试流程和面试所需要的各项提问 2、 本人沟通能力较强, 组织协调能力较强, 上传下达能在客户经理, 部门经 理以及候选人之间充分发挥协调作用, 使各方互利共赢。 3、 本人对人力资源等相关工作有浓厚的兴趣以及有明确的职业规划,想在人 力资源行业得到长久稳定的发展 4、 本人工作稳定性较强, 抗压能力较强, 坚持能力较强。
教育经历 武昌工学院 专业方向 学历学位 2019 年 09 月——2023 年 06 月 会计学 本科 (统招)
三、
成都新大瀚人力资源有限责任公司 武汉 六、 校园经历 2019 年 9 月——2020 年担任校文艺部干事一职 2021 年 9 月——至今担任校广播台台长一职 在以上部门期间, 曾多次参与组织校内各大文艺, 艺术类活动, 并多次担任各大 晚会的主持人。
七、 所获奖项
2020 年 "一. 二九" 演讲比赛二等奖 2021 年 "百生讲坛" 优秀主讲人活动三等奖 2022 年 "校园好声音. 主持人大赛" 三等奖 2022 年 "全国大学生正文大赛——湖北省赛区" 一等奖
八、 所获证书 CET-4 普通话二级甲等

学历:本科 教育背景 2019.9-2023.06 武汉学院 英语 ( 本科 ) 主修课程 : 高级英语、 英美文学概况、 IT英语翻译、 商务翻译、 英汉文化比较与翻译、 同声传译、 高级口译、 英 语语言学、 第二外语 ( 日 )

sections.text: 个人简历
求职意向 人才搜索员
姓 名 陈博民
学 历 本科 出生年月 1999.09 电 话 18140523051 政治面貌 共青团员 邮 箱 506142054@qq.com 现 居 湖北省武汉市
教育背景 2021.09-2023.06 中南财经政法大学武汉学院 工商管理 本科  主修课程 : 管理学、 财务管理、 市场营销、 经济法、 消费者行为学等等 2018.09-2021.06 中南财经政法大学武汉学院 工商管理 专科  主修课程 : 微观经济学、 宏观经济学、 统计学、 会计学等等

工作经历 2021.9-至今 个人创业 美甲店  产品营销 : 负责产品海报设计 , 分析产品卖点 , 提升产品吸引力 , 实现单日销售额破 1000 , 累积销售额 10W+  用户运营 : 线上建立起超千人的客户群体 , 通过了解联系客户需求 , 跟进顾客沟通反馈 , 增加后续转化机会  物资采购 : 负责进货渠道分析 , 通过对比产品 , 分析价格优势 , , 降低进货成本 , 净利润提升至 80% 2021.6-2021.9 乐思教育机构 学科老师  课程教学 : 负责 3 个班教学工作 , 为学生提供专业的高质量教学服务 , 及时与家长沟通反馈 , 家长好评率 100%  教学策略 : 分析教务数据 , 复盘输出教学总结调整教学策略 , 运用多种教学方式和管理技巧 , 调动学生积极性 2021.1-2021.6 广东省友友包装材料有限公司 行政文员  资料归整 : 日常资料录入 , 通讯录的更新等各类文职工作 , 对资料进行核对归类建档 , 日常查找效率提高 30%  人事协助 : 协助公司人事进行人员招聘 , 跟进招聘信息发布 , 组织安排面试 , 新员工入职等一系列事务 2019.07-2019.09 汨罗市三城塑料有限公司 销售专员  客户沟通 : 箱包公司担任箱包统计分销等工作 , 建立客户档案 , 和客户保持定期联系  产品分析 : 熟悉箱包种类并对其进行整理 , 对各种箱包的市场进行分析 , 对其市场占有进行下一季度的评估 校内实践 2019.9-2020.9 武汉学院管理学院 朋辈导师  团队管理 : 带领 30+班级团体 , 组织多元化的活动或是为同学提供有助组织活动的资源 , 活动依据全人教育的理 念 , 以培育导师与学生两者的个人成长为目标 , 为初进校园的学生提供指导作用。
技能证书  证书 : 社科奖第十一届全国高校市场营销大赛 , 并荣获策划案单项赛三等奖 , 并连续三年获得奖学金。  技能 : 通过 CET4 考试 , 普通话二级甲等 ; 教师资格证考试 , 全国计算机二级考试 , 熟练运用 office 相关软件
自我评价  专业能力 : 拥有专业知识基础 , 并处理专业领域业务 , 对职位有一定未来规划  个人能力 : 大学及实习过程中有丰富的项目经验 , 能够清晰地将观点进行全面的输出  综合素质 : 性格开朗 , 善于与人沟通交流 , 有责任心 , 目标感强 , 具备强大的抗压能力

accreditation.inputStr: Master of Science in Mechanical Engineering
Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering

data.objective: Seeking a full-time job in Control or Robotic fields.

sections.text: YI-CHUNG SU 321 South 5th Street, Unit 240, Ames, Iowa 50010 | yichusu@umich.edu | (734)709-5275
OBJECTIVE Seeking a full-time job in Control or Robotic fields.

EDUCATION University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, MI, USA Apr.2018 Master of Science in Mechanical Engineering GPA: 3.66/4.00 National Taiwan University, Taipei, Taiwan Jun.2014 Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering

WORK EXPERIENCES Smart Ag., Ames, Iowa(Autonomous Tractor Startup) Sep.2018-Present Autonomous Vehicle Engineer • Worked in the Agile Scrum team to improve the John Deere tractor's control system with python and Docker. • Redesigned the Tractor's safety system to deal with emergency conditions based on Test-driven Development. • Built the hardware simulator with fake CAN messages, fake perception messages and fake GPS data to test the system. • Programmed unit tests and integration tests for every function in the program using Travis, Catch2, and Fake-it. • Developed radar detection code using C++ and Bosch mid-range radar and Continental Radar. • Launched a heartbeat program between main CPU and redundant CPU by serial communication. • Implemented the Safety Stop program through I2C Bus between redundant CPU and brake module. • Developed the speed controller algorithm(Gear selection and throttle adjustment) for tractors with Power Shift Transmission by using state machine QNX environment. Automation Dept., Syntec Technology, Hsinchu, Taiwan(Leading CNC controller manufacturer) May-Jun.2017 Mechanical Engineering Intern • Built 3D CAD models including robotic arm, CNC, and conveyor system to demo industry 4.0 products. • Simulated milling processes using ABB Robotstudio Machining PowerPac to assess its auto-path generation function.

PROJECT EXPERIENCES Computer Vision Project April.2018 • Developed a feature-based lane detection algorithm using OpenCV. • Fine-tuned a CNN model to do car detection using YOLOv2 and achieved up to 87.6% IOU in the testing video. Vehicle Dynamics Project April.2018 • Simulated the linear vehicle model's movement by Simulink and Matlab. • Analyzed and identified the tire cornering stiffness by using the linear bicycle model and the experimental data. • Designed a steering controller to track a predefined path using Pure Pursuit control. Automated vehicles' Sensors and Data Mining Project Mar.2018 • Analyze Lidar/Radar/GPS/Ultrasonic data from rosbag. • Extracted lane change events from a naturalistic driving database using MySQL. Mechatronics Project Sep.-Dec.2017 • Sensor Fusion for Accurate Angular Measurement: integrated an accelerometer along with the low-pass filter and a gyro along with the high-pass filter for the pendulum tilt angle measurement. • Inverted Pendulum Mechatronic System Design: identified the model parameters and designed a full-state feedback control system to stabilize an inverted pendulum through Linear-Quadratic Regulator (LQR) method and a classical control system with two loops which the inner loop with negative feedback while the out loop with positive feedback. • DC Motor and Stepper Motor Position and Velocity Control: assessed motor's performance characteristics for different input and designed controllers to meet the position and velocity error requirement. Self-Driving Car Project Dec.2017 • Constructed a car obstacles-avoidance controller using PID control. • Achieved the controller with the planned-trajectory as the reference, traction force and steering angle as the control inputs to control the vehicle to follow the trajectory without crashing the track boundary. Robot Kinematics and Dynamics Project Apr.2017 • Developed a robotic arm that can grab a small-size object given its position using Arduino and servo motor. • Implemented DH table and two inverse kinematic methods (MIT rule and inverse Jacobian) to compute the joint angles and transmitted these data into Simulink and Arduino to activate the motor and simulation.
SKILLS C++, Python, Matlab, Simulink, Labview, Arduino, RobotStudio, SolidWorks, Linux, OpenCV, ROS, MySQL, YOLOV2, CUDA, cuDNN, CANBus, Docker, MQTT, Git, React, Redux, Travis CI, Catch, CMake, UDP

workExperience.jobDescription:
Worked in the Agile Scrum team to improve the John Deere tractor's control system with python and Docker. 
•Redesigned the Tractor's safety system to deal with emergency conditions based on Test-driven Development. 
•Built the hardware simulator with fake CAN messages, fake perception messages and fake GPS data to test the system. 
•Programmed unit tests and integration tests for every function in the program using Travis, Catch2, and Fake-it. 
•Developed radar detection code using C++ and Bosch mid-range radar and Continental Radar. 
•Launched a heartbeat program between main CPU and redundant CPU by serial communication. 
•Implemented the Safety Stop program through I2C Bus between redundant CPU and brake module. 
•Developed the speed controller algorithm(Gear selection and throttle adjustment) for tractors with Power Shift Transmission by using state machine QNX environment.

classification.title: Vehicle technicians, mechanics and electricians
classification.subMajorGroup: SKILLED METAL, ELECTRICAL AND ELECTRONIC TRADES

workExperience.jobDescription:
Built 3D CAD models including robotic arm, CNC, and conveyor system to demo industry 4.0 products. 
•Simulated milling processes using ABB Robotstudio Machining PowerPac to assess its auto-path generation function.

classification.title: Mechanical engineers
classification.subMajorGroup: SCIENCE, RESEARCH, ENGINEERING AND TECHNOLOGY PROFESSIONALS

SKILLS C++, Python, Matlab, Simulink, Labview, Arduino, RobotStudio, SolidWorks, Linux, OpenCV, ROS, MySQL, YOLOV2, CUDA, cuDNN, CANBus, Docker, MQTT, Git, React, Redux, Travis CI, Catch, CMake, UDP

sections.text: 马晶晶 15922435363 lilypps@163.com 1991年, 已婚
自我评价: 抗压, 拥抱变化, 五年互联网医疗经验, 打造最专业的医生经纪人团队

2016.04 - 至今,好大夫在线 · 互动峰科技 (北京) 有限公司 2019年7月--至今地区经理 目前团队员工7人, 2017-2019年市场顾问 独立负责上海三甲医院, 2017年至今独立签约 2016.04-2017.04 协助VP创建销售支持团队, 2015.02 - 2016.03, 1 年 1 个月三胞集团有限公司 营销支持高级专员 服务于三胞集团旗下大健康板块Natali及安康通, 是三胞旗下的专注健康养老的公司。 任职 于营销管理部, 支持含渠道部在内的四个部门, 工作主要汇报给VP。 1、 支持全体销售人员, 包含销售团队数据收集, 会议安排, 2、 3、 PPT、 word及 B2C活动策划及现场暖场主持; 黑龙江路演方案设计及活动支持; 展 会支持, 已成功支持含ChinaAid, 西安老博会, 武汉CFFA等各大展会, 包括前期准备, 后 勤保障, 物料管理, 现场与客户沟通等; 2015年公司首次年会负责统筹, 含出节目及活动 流程安排及现场协调, 现场人数约 200人; 接待重要政府客户及渠道客户, 协调用餐、 住宿、 用车等事宜; 6、 协助销售人员进行重点客户和潜在客户的电话沟通与商务面谈。 2014.07 - 2015.02, 7 如新(中国) 日用保健品有限公司 外商独资 · 外企办事处食品/饮料/烟酒/日化 1000-2000人
销售支持培训部
教育经历 安徽大学 · 旅游管理 · 本科 2010.09 - 2014.07 统招 211 一流学科大学
在校期间获奖信息: 2014 年 6 月 : 获得安徽大学优秀毕业生荣誉称号 2014 年 4 月 : 获得安徽省优秀毕业生荣誉称号 2013 年 10 月 31 号: 获得第四届哈尔滨大学生创业大赛 B 类团队三等奖 2013-2014 学年第一学期: 获得国家励志奖学金 2012-2013 学年第一学期: 获得国家励志奖学金, 安徽大学三好学生

education.organization: The University of Texas at Dallas, Naveen Jindal School of Management
Shanghai University of International Business and Economics

sections.text: Yichun(Kate) Qu qyc1 1@hotmail.com ◦ 18964858957 ◦ Shanghai
TECHNICAL SKILLS Power BI ◦ Tableau ◦ Data Management ◦ Data Modeling ◦ SQL (MCSA 461,462 passed) ◦ ERP ◦ CRM ◦ Excel ◦ SAS ◦ R ◦ Python

EXPERIENCE I-77 Mobility Partners LLC/ Cintra US / Ferrovial Charlotte, North Carolina OperationDataAnalyst July 2018- April 2021 • Work with business stakeholders to translate business requirement into functional requirement. • Set up the Power BI database, design and develop all the custom metrics, reports and dashboards in Power BI to meet functional requirements for the whole operation department by cooperating with IT team in Spain. • Clarify end user's inquiry on reports' features and functionalities, continuously optimize reports along with the developing operating procedure. • Collect and consolidate data from different portals to prepare monthly and quarterly operational reports for upper management to track enterprise level KPI. • Conduct analytical projects on massive datasets with tableau to analyze system operational constraints, deficiencies and defects, collaborate with operation team and tech team to develop solutions. • Monitor and report on accurate transaction generation at the roadside, timely data transmission, data validation oftransaction, track and analyze system performance and operation performance. • Participate in the implementation and testing ofCentral Systems, track results and records and escalate system performance issues. Prodigy Diabetes Care LLC Charlotte, North Carolina DataandBillingAnalyst Oct 2017- June 2018 • Extracted data from CRM system, created monthly reports based on different key performance indicators including customer complaint code, complaint over 60 days and average complaint solving days. • Created and compared charts, tables and graphs, identified trends and occurrences. • Prepared advanced shipping notice by using electronic data interchange system, maintained data integrity ofinventory system by trouble shooting between Redtail and Microsoft GP. • Searched, extracted, managed and analyzed data in Microsoft Dynamics Great Plains system to support daily business process and annual auditing. LVMH Perfumes & Cosmetics (Shanghai) Company Limited Shanghai, China FRESHTrainingDepartmentBusinessAnalystIntern January 2014 – June 2015 • Performed ad-hoc reports ofbeauty advisors' basic information for training and sales department. • Created monthly, quarterly, and yearly coaching reports for more than 200 beauty advisors from the whole China department and presented it in PowerPoint in department meetings to improve beauty advisors' selling skills. • Troubleshooted and analyzed reports using Excel (V lookup, pivot tables) to follow up beauty advisors' performance every season, helped training department to achieve higher efficiency on training beauty advisors' selling skills by 15%. • Tracked and analyzed actual product using and ordering on a monthly basis, forecasted second year product ordering based on the purchase price variance and budget variance. • Supported the creation of key door action plan, provided insight into the establishment of SKU sales target of each beauty advisor.

EDUCATION The University of Texas at Dallas, Naveen Jindal School of Management Dallas, TX MasterofScienceinInformationTechnologyandManagement August 2016 - May 2017 GPA: 3.6/4.0 MasterofScienceinFinance(FirstYearinShanghaiJiaoTongUniversity) September 2014 - August 2016 GPA: 3.5/4.0 Shanghai University of International Business and Economics Shanghai, China BachelorofArtinEnglish September 2010 - June 2014 GPA: 3.7 / 4.0

workExperience.organization: I-77 Mobility Partners LLC/ Cintra US / Ferrovial
workExperience.jobDescription:
Work with business stakeholders to translate business requirement into functional requirement. 
•Set up the Power BI database, design and develop all the custom metrics, reports and dashboards in Power BI to meet functional requirements for the whole operation department by cooperating with IT team in Spain. 
•Clarify end user's inquiry on reports' features and functionalities, continuously optimize reports along with the developing operating procedure. 
•Collect and consolidate data from different portals to prepare monthly and quarterly operational reports for upper management to track enterprise level KPI. 
•Conduct analytical projects on massive datasets with tableau to analyze system operational constraints, deficiencies and defects, collaborate with operation team and tech team to develop solutions. 
•Monitor and report on accurate transaction generation at the roadside, timely data transmission, data validation oftransaction, track and analyze system performance and operation performance. 
•Participate in the implementation and testing ofCentral Systems, track results and records and escalate system performance issues.

Extracted data from CRM system, created monthly reports based on different key performance indicators including customer complaint code, complaint over 60 days and average complaint solving days. 
•Created and compared charts, tables and graphs, identified trends and occurrences. 
•Prepared advanced shipping notice by using electronic data interchange system, maintained data integrity ofinventory system by trouble shooting between Redtail and Microsoft GP. 
•Searched, extracted, managed and analyzed data in Microsoft Dynamics Great Plains system to support daily business process and annual auditing.

Performed ad-hoc reports ofbeauty advisors' basic information for training and sales department. 
•Created monthly, quarterly, and yearly coaching reports for more than 200 beauty advisors from the whole China department and presented it in PowerPoint in department meetings to improve beauty advisors' selling skills. 
•Troubleshooted and analyzed reports using Excel (V lookup, pivot tables) to follow up beauty advisors' performance every season, helped training department to achieve higher efficiency on training beauty advisors' selling skills by 15%. 
•Tracked and analyzed actual product using and ordering on a monthly basis, forecasted second year product ordering based on the purchase price variance and budget variance. 
•Supported the creation of key door action plan, provided insight into the establishment of SKU sales target of each beauty advisor.
